invention-title: Natural gas hydrogen production reformer and use method thereof
一种天然气制氢转化炉及其使用方法

abstract.p: The natural gas hydrogen production conversion furnace comprises a hydrogen production furnace, one side of the top end of the hydrogen production furnace communicates with a feeding port, the side, away from the feeding port, of the hydrogen production furnace communicates with an exhaust port, a plurality of gas inlets are formed in the middle of the bottom end of the hydrogen production furnace side by side, and a furnace cavity is formed in the hydrogen production furnace. When the hydrogen production furnace needs to be rotated, the motor is started, the hydrogen production furnace is controlled to rotate integrally, the first guide roller and the second guide roller at the two ends of the hydrogen production furnace slide and guide along the surfaces of the four carrier rollers respectively until the gas inlet is turned over to one side from the bottom end and is kept parallel to the platform by an angle, and then a worker can maintain and replace the gas inlet on one side; the length of the heating pipe is greater than the height of the furnace chamber, and the heating pipe mounting port is higher than the liquid level of the liquid metal, so that the air inlet can be maintained and replaced in the liquid state, the maintenance is more convenient, and the liquid metal is not solidified, so that the energy consumption during maintenance and overhaul can be greatly reduced.

本发明公开了一种天然气制氢转化炉及其使用方法，包括制氢炉，所述制氢炉的顶端一侧连通有加料口，所述制氢炉远离加料口的一侧连通有排气口，所述制氢炉的底端中部并排设置有若干个进气口，所述制氢炉的内部开设有炉腔。本发明当需要旋转制氢炉时，启动电机，控制制氢炉整体旋转，且制氢炉两端的第一导辊和第二导辊分别沿着四个托辊表面滑动导向，直至进气口从底端翻转至一侧，且与平台保持角度平行，然后工人即可在一侧维护和更换进气口，加热管的长度大于炉腔的高度，由于加热管安装口高于液态金属液面，这样可以保证在液态时维护和更换进气口，维护更加方便，优势在于液态金属未凝固，可以大幅降低维护检修时的能耗。
